p:
Environmental contamination with SARS‐CoV‐2 is also becoming quite apparent.
170 ,
171 ,
172 ,
173 ,
174 Although there are differences for specific surfaces more at risk among these reports, there is consistency that environmental spread is a significant problem. The latter may include personal protective equipment.
173 Most such studies, however, have used viral RNA detection. The finding of viral RNA in municipal wastewater has been cited.
175
